slides.description: 1998: The year they said "I do," and a lifetime of love began. Still feels like yesterday. Happy Anniversary!
Diwali in our first little flat. A tiny space, a mountain of love, and the start of forever, Mom and Dad.
You were my rock during those stressful 10th boards. Thank you for your unwavering support and belief in me.
Every Holi we share bursts with color, just like our lives, thanks to your unwavering love.
That first Nainital trip, hand-in-hand, filled with shared laughter and dreams, remains a precious chapter in your beautiful love story.
Every year, Ganpati fills our home with joy. It reminds me of simpler times, family laughter, and a love that grows stronger with each passing celebration.
Sixteen years. Sixteen years of love, laughter, and building a family. Happy anniversary to the two people who made my life possible.
To Aai's place, through all the years. So many journeys, so much love, laughter, and memories made.
It's not about the fancy dinners or perfect gifts, but the simple joy of being together, anywhere.
Through thick and thin, even a pandemic's shadow couldn't dim their love. Years of devotion, a timeless bond we cherish.
Aurangabad: where their journey began. Now, years etched with love and laughter, we celebrate the magic that blossomed in that very city.
Mahabaleshwar whispers memories of Mummy's birthdays, a journey etched in love and laughter, a beautiful chapter in our family's story.
Another Diwali, another year brighter because you're together. Seeing your love still shines so warmly fills my heart with happy memories.
Remembering Pondicherry: That trip, filled with laughter and shared dreams, marks another year of your beautiful journey together.
Singapore: a cherished escape, our best trip ever. We made memories that bloom brighter with each passing year
Through life's ups and downs, their love has been a constant. Happy Parent's Anniversary to two hearts forever intertwined.
Two cars, countless memories, one incredible journey together. Here's to many more roads ahead!
Their smiles in Kolhapur, etched forever in time. A journey of love, laughter, and shared dreams.
Bhandardhara glows, just like your love. Fireflies dance, mirroring the sparks that flew on your special day.
Leaving home for my Master's felt like tearing a piece of my heart away. Saying goodbye to my parents was so hard, a memory I still hold close.
To my amazing parents: Through all these years, your love has been our guiding light. Your smiles fill our hearts with joy.
Though miles may separate us, your enduring love story still warms my heart and inspires me, today and always.
Twenty-seven years woven with love and unwavering support. Remembering their journey, celebrating their forever. Happy Anniversary, Mom and Dad.
